item.title: Diun Dash
item.description:
Diun Dash

A web-based dashboard to visualize and manage Docker image update notifications from Diun
item.content:encoded:
Diun Dash

A web-based dashboard to visualize and manage Docker image update notifications from Diun

item.title: Guide: Obsidian with free, self-hosted, instant sync
item.description:
Guide: Obsidian with free, self-hosted, instant sync

I’ve been using Obsidian with the LiveSync plugin by vrtmrz for over a month now and not counting the Arr stack, this plugin is without a doubt, the single-best self-hosted service that I run on my server. I use it multiple times a day and at this point I can’t live without it. So I decided to contribute back to the community, which has taught me so much, by sharing my experience and also writing a detailed guide. I found that most guides gloss over crucial steps, but then again I rarely know what I’m doing, so take my guide with a pinch of salt.
item.content:encoded:
Guide: Obsidian with free, self-hosted, instant sync

I’ve been using Obsidian with the LiveSync plugin by vrtmrz for over a month now and not counting the Arr stack, this plugin is without a doubt, the single-best self-hosted service that I run on my server. I use it multiple times a day and at this point I can’t live without it. So I decided to contribute back to the community, which has taught me so much, by sharing my experience and also writing a detailed guide. I found that most guides gloss over crucial steps, but then again I rarely know what I’m doing, so take my guide with a pinch of salt.

item.title: Grist attachment viewer widget
item.description:
Grist attachment viewer widget

I’m really surprised that there’s no built-in custom widget for viewing attachments. It was easy enough for ChatGPT to make one for me with the Custom Widget Builder, but given the existence of the image viewer widget, it seems like something like this should be built-in.
item.content:encoded:
Grist attachment viewer widget

I’m really surprised that there’s no built-in custom widget for viewing attachments. It was easy enough for ChatGPT to make one for me with the Custom Widget Builder, but given the existence of the image viewer widget, it seems like something like this should be built-in.

item.title: PSE Data Scraper
item.description:
PSE Data Scraper

Python scripts for retrieving PSE stocks data via API.
Serves to me like a reference for my n8n workflow.
item.content:encoded:
PSE Data Scraper

Python scripts for retrieving PSE stocks data via API.

item.title: Pocket 2FA
item.description:
Pocket 2FA

Mobile client for secure offline access to two-factor authentication codes with 2FAuth server synchronization.
This can be installed on your Android phone or Windows computer.
item.content:encoded:
Pocket 2FA

Mobile client for secure offline access to two-factor authentication codes with 2FAuth server synchronization.
This can be installed on your Android phone or Windows computer.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01K4RG2A8JVT8Q5H2Z4TTX5X5F
item.description: Finally took the plunge on the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra… in 2025. At ₱41,490 (down from its ₱84,990 launch price), the 18-month wait was worth it. Still flagship specs, but at half the cost.
item.content:encoded: Finally took the plunge on the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra… in 2025. At ₱41,490 (down from its ₱84,990 launch price), the 18-month wait was worth it. Still flagship specs, but at half the cost.

item.title: Sprout Track
item.description:

A tracker to track baby diapers, feedings, naps, pumping, and other activities.
Alternative to Baby Buddy?
